shortcuts.title: Quick Search
shortcuts.description: Pressing <kbd>/</kbd> puts the cursor in the module search bar at the top for easy navigation to a module's homepage.

shortcuts.title: Help
shortcuts.description: Pressing <kbd>?</kbd> will quickly jump you to this [Help](/help) page.

shortcuts.title: Timetable
shortcuts.description: Pressing <kbd>T</kbd> will quickly jump you to the [Timetable](/timetable) page.

shortcuts.title: Modules
shortcuts.description: Pressing <kbd>M</kbd> will quickly jump you to the [Modules Catalogue](/modules) page.

shortcuts.title: Venues
shortcuts.description: Pressing <kbd>V</kbd> will quickly jump you to the [Venues](/venues) page.

shortcuts.title: Venue Availability
shortcuts.description: Pressing <kbd>L</kbd> will quickly jump you to the [Venue Availability](/venueavailability) page.

shortcuts.title: News
shortcuts.description: Pressing <kbd>N</kbd> will quickly jump you to the [News](/news) page.

shortcuts.title: Preferences
shortcuts.description: Pressing <kbd>P</kbd> will quickly jump you to the [Preferences](/preferences) page.

shortcuts.title: Apps
shortcuts.description: Pressing <kbd>A</kbd> will quickly jump you to the [Apps](/apps) page.

shortcuts.title: Add modules to timetable
shortcuts.description: Pressing <kbd>.</kbd> will focus on the search box where you can add modules to the timetable.

shortcuts.title: Jump to prerequisites
shortcuts.description: Pressing <kbd>E</kbd> will jump to the module prerequisites visualization section of the module page.

shortcuts.title: Jump to reviews and discussions
shortcuts.description: Pressing <kbd>R</kbd> will jump to the reviews and discussions section of the module page.

shortcuts.title: Jump to CORS bidding history
shortcuts.description: Pressing <kbd>C</kbd> will jump to the CORS bidding history section of the module page.

shortcuts.title: Jump to module's class schedule
shortcuts.description: Pressing <kbd>S</kbd> will jump to the class schedule section of the module page.

shortcuts.title: Toggle modes
shortcuts.description: Pressing <kbd>X</kbd> will switch between the light and dark modes of the site.

shortcuts.title: Switch theme
shortcuts.description: Pressing <kbd>←</kbd> and <kbd>→</kbd> will switch between the available theme colours for modules in the timetable.
